hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT player_profile.user_id userId, CASE WHEN player_score.cur_score > 0.00 THEN "胜利" WHEN player_score.cur_score < 0.00 THEN "失败" WHEN player_score.cur_score = 0.00 THEN "平局" ELSE "未知" END AS winandlose, player_score.cur_score AS score, player_score.sys_score AS systemscore, game_record.game_id AS gameId, CASE WHEN game_record.game_type = 'FightLandlordGame' THEN "斗地主" WHEN game_record.game_type = 'Red5Game' THEN "大连红五" WHEN game_record.game_type = 'PushdownWinGame' THEN "推倒胡" WHEN game_record.game_type = 'QiongWinGame' THEN "穷胡" ELSE "未知" END AS gameType, DATE_FORMAT(player_score.create_time, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(?, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(?, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS endTime FROM player_profile LEFT JOIN player_score ON player_score.profile_id = player_profile.profile_id LEFT JOIN game_record ON player_score.game_id = game_record.game_id WHERE (UPPER(player_profile.user_id) LIKE UPPER(?)) AND player_score.create_time BETWEEN ? AND date_add(?, interval 1 day) AND (CASE WHEN player_score.cur_score > 0 THEN 1 WHEN player_score.cur_score < 0 THEN -1 WHEN player_score.cur_score = 0 THEN 0 END = ? OR 999 = ?) AND (? is null or player_profile.rls_path like ?) ORDER BY player_profile.create_time asc, game_record.game_type asc, player_score.create_time desc

SELECT COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT, ?, ? FROM player_profile LEFT JOIN player_score ON player_score.profile_id = player_profile.profile_id LEFT JOIN game_record ON player_score.game_id = game_record.game_id WHERE (UPPER(player_profile.user_id) LIKE UPPER(?)) AND player_score.create_time BETWEEN ? AND date_add(?, interval 1 day) AND (CASE WHEN player_score.cur_score > 0 THEN 1 WHEN player_score.cur_score < 0 THEN -1 WHEN player_score.cur_score = 0 THEN 0 END = ? OR 999 = ?) AND (? is null or player_profile.rls_path like ?)
